definitions.definition: To obtain the services of in return for fixed payment.
definitions.example: We hired a car for two weeks because ours had broken down.

definitions.definition: To employ; to obtain the services of (a person) in exchange for remuneration; to give someone a job.
definitions.example: The company had problems when it tried to hire more skilled workers.

definitions.definition: To exchange the services of for remuneration.
definitions.example: They hired themselves out as day laborers.  They hired out their basement for Inauguration week.

definitions.definition: To accomplish by paying for services.
definitions.example: After waiting two years for her husband to finish the tiling, she decided to hire it done.
They hired out as day laborers.
